Class Utils

      static void textFileToStringBuffer(java.lang.Class cl, java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.StringBuffer sb, java.lang.String sep)
      Reads a text file under resource and appends it in a String Buffer Example textFileToStringBuffer(FileUtils.class, "hello.txt", sb, "\n") It will read the file "hello.txt" located where FileUtils.class is located

      • textFileToStringBuffer

        public static void textFileToStringBuffer(java.lang.Class cl,
                          java.lang.String fileName,
                          java.lang.StringBuffer sb,
                          java.lang.String sep)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a text file under resource and appends it in a String Buffer Example textFileToStringBuffer(FileUtils.class, "hello.txt", sb, "\n") It will read the file "hello.txt" located where FileUtils.class is located
        Parameters:
        cl - The Class
        fileName - The filename
        sb - The StringBuffer
        sep - The line separator
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        java.io.IOException

      • updateMapInfo

        public static void updateMapInfo(java.lang.String state,
                 S3Access s3,
                 int num)
                          throws C3PROException
        Update the counts for the map of the given state We synchronized the method to avoid mis counting.
        Parameters:
        state - The state being updated
        s3 - The S3 access object
        num - The number to be added to the count of the state
        Throws:
        C3PROException - In case an error occurs
